RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 52. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 4 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or LessNot Cons idered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUR BUCKWHEAT prompted the early pace along the rail, dropped back a bit before the turn, shifted out nearing the quarter pole, rallied three wide to make the lead before the furlong marker and prevailed under mild right handed urging. PLAYING FOR KEEPS away alertly, drifted inward soon after the start for several strides, causing the riders of STARS N SPACE and TURBO POWER to check, set the early pace two wide, gave up the lead on the turn and finished second best along the rail. PROSECUTOR offered a mild bid three wide past the quarter pole then leveled off. THE GOSPEL OF MARK passed tiring rivals. STARS N SPACE checked leaving the chute, prompted the early pace three wide, made the lead entering the turn, set the pace into the stretch then came up empty. ATILANO'S THUNDER missed the break and was always outrun. TURBO POWER checked shortly after leaving the chute and was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Our Buckwheat
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Snow Racing Stables and Boots N Bikinis LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, angled out turn, rallied 3 wide, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Stars N Space
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked chute, speed 3 wide, led turn 2 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Prosecutor
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 4 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ohio R egistered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OTIS OTIS OTIS stalked the pace three wide into the stretch, drew on even terms for the lead near the three sixteenths marker despite being carried out to the six path by the leader and proved best in a stiff drive under right handed urging. ALWAYS MISCHIEVOUS set a pressured pace two wide through the turn, drifted to the five path entering the stretch, dug in gamely when joined by the winner but finished second best. YOU ARE AWESOME forwardly place along the inside, swung out to the seven path in upper stretch and was steadily gaining ground late. THE COACHMAN drew on even terms for the lead along the rail before a quarter, dropped back a bit on the turn, came on again through mid stretch but was outfinished. GUN LAP with the second flight three wide, swung wide and finished evenly. MASAI MAN was no threat. RUMBLE STRIP RON had good early speed then faded. POWERFUL MOON had speed into the turn then wilted.

ENTRY.NAME: The Coachman
ENTRY.COMMENT: even terms rail early, dropped back turn, came again, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Gun Lap
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, swung wide, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Always Mischievous
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2wide, drifted 5path, dug in gamely, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Otis Otis Otis
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, carried 6path, long drive, all out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 4 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals P referred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORE MUCHO unhurried early, closed with a rush in the five path through deep stretch under strong urging and got up in the final strides. DREAM MUSIC was bumped at the start, sprinted to the lead soon thereafter, set the pace into the stretch, drew clear while drifting to the seven path and just missed hanging on. VAVITE never far back, had a mild late rally in the four path. TURBIE chased the pace from the four wide into the stretch, drifted to the eight path and finished evenly. PLAYFUL SUMMER was no factor. INDY LITES was no threat. SKIRTS KID broke outward bumping DREAM MUSIC, vied for the lead along the rail until into the stretch then stopped abruptly.

ENTRY.NAME: Skirts Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped start, inside speed 1/8p, stopped abruptly

ENTRY.NAME: Dream Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, sprinted clear, set pace, drifted 7path, caught

ENTRY.NAME: More Mucho
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed with a rush 5path, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Vavite
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied late 4path, good effort,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 22400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 4 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STAR MABEE battled for the lead two wide into the stretch, made the lead before the furlong marker and prevailed under confident handling. PISTOL PACKIN BOS never far back, finished determinedly along the rail. BISCAYNE BAY unhurried early, found her best stride late outside. CITY SIGNS pressed the pace four wide into the turn, made the lead before a half, set the pace into upper stretch then came up empty. LADY ABRIL contested the lead three wide into the turn then faded. CARMEN OHIO failed to menace. BEST OF YOU was outrun. J J'S FANCY settled outside and was no factor. BAY MAGIC dueled for the lead along the rail for nearly a half then stopped in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Carmen Ohio
ENTRY.OWNER: Royer Family Stables LLC and Aurora Racing

ENTRY.NAME: Pistol Packin Bos
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well rail

ENTRY.NAME: Biscayne Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late outside

ENTRY.NAME: Star Mabee
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide, wore down rivals, gamely,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 53. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 4 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or LessNot Cons idered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRIMITIVO was restless in the gate, vied for the lead along the inside into the turn, shifted out past the quarter pole, surged late three wide and was along in time. FLAG RAISER battled for the lead two wide into the stretch, gained the advantage late then couldn't handle the winner. LITTLE TOY GUNS drifted out at the start, contested the lead along the rail until deep stretch then was outfinished. DANES HEART allowed to settle, closed a gap late in the five path. PLAYING BALL hopped at the start and passed tiring rivals. MARCH MAGIC was a sharp threat four then two wide and faded in the stretch. ORLEANS STORM was fractious in the gate, squeezed at the start and outrun. HEIDI FIVE was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Primitivo
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, vied inside, angled out 1/4p, closed 3w, in time

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Richard C. Spicer & William D. Spitler

ENTRY.NAME: Little Toy Guns
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Beckett Racing Team LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, dueled inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Orleans Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, squeezed start, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Danes Heart
ENTRY.OWNER: McFadden Jr Joseph A and Fewster Melody K
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed gap late 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Flag Raiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, led late, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE JULY 4, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 4 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAREBACK FUN away alertly, set a pressured pace into the stretch, drifted to the six path and drew away under mild urging. IMMACULATE HEART stalked the pace three wide, drifted to the seven path and finished second best. JOYFUL NOISE with the second flight inside, finished evenly in the four path. TEAM GOLD DIGGER trailed into the stretch, swung wide and had a mild late gain. TALK DIRTY saved ground and lacked the needed response. SHELLEY'S GEM prompted the pace two wide through the turn then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Bareback Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, shook clear, drifted 6path,

ENTRY.NAME: Joyful Noise
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C

ENTRY.NAME: Shelley's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Immaculate Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, drifted 7path, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 56. Claiming Purse 17900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 4 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price$7,500.$ 7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAN I GO TOO dropped inside shortly after leaving the chute, rushed up to press the pace before a quarter, made the lead past the quarter pole then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while taken in hand late. PENNIESANDDIMES set a pressured pace two wide past the quarter pole then was no match for the winner but gamely held on for second. CEE CEE'S GOT THIS stalked the pace from the start and finished with good courage in the five path. MILWAUKEE CAT close up early, dropped back before the turn and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Penniesanddimes
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 2 wide, no match for winner, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Can I Go Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped inside, pressed, took over top lane, much best, handily,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 64. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 4 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 4 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12, 500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWEET UNIQUE made the lead soon after the start, set all the pace, shook clear in upper stretch and won under confident handling. SERGER never far back, offered a mild bid in the three path into the stretch, angled out to the four path and finished clear for second. STEALTH MODE broke through the gate prior to the start, upon being reloaded pressured the winner along the inside early, shifted out to the five path entering the stretch then faded. QUEENIE ROSE failed to menace. SAVESOMEFORME hit the gate and was no threat. GETOUTOFTHEHAREM was no factor. MARGARITA CINCO had good early speed and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Unique
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, shook clear, confident

ENTRY.NAME: Stealth Mode
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, shifted out 5path, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Margarita Cinco
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Serger
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, middle move 3path, second best 4path
